data.name: Pathfinder Adventures: The Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack for Pathfinder Adventures.

by

Justin E. Bell

01 - Pathfinder Adventures - Title Theme.mp3 00:03:59
02 - Pathfinder Adventures - Choose Your Quest (Level Select).mp3 00:04:01

07 - Pathfinder Adventures - The Villain.mp3 00:01:06
08 - Pathfinder Adventures - Defeat.mp3 00:00:11
09 - Pathfinder Adventures - Victory.mp3 00:00:16
10 - Pathfinder Adventures - Loot.mp3 00:03:51
11 - Pathfinder Adventures - Store.mp3 00:02:25
12 - Pathfinder Adventures - Title Theme (Alternate Version).mp3 00:03:59

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
